alert.note: Alert for Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 08 at 6:42PM MDT until July 08 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL WELD COUNTY... At 642 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Hereford, or 23 miles southeast of Cheyenne, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Grover. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
